title: Choice and competition in publicly funded health care
abstract:
There are four basic models of health service delivery: those that rely on trust, on command and control, on voice, and on choice and competition. All have their merits and demerits; but there are both theoretical and empirical arguments for preferring choice and competition in many situations. However,\ud
the relevant policies do have to be properly designed
